title: Girl Spins a Blade
description: With the help of her "Granny," Emily Kane had the strength to fight off the black-ops teams hunting her. Now she needs to find some relief from Granny, and to reconcile herself to the violence she had to unleash. She hopes to find spiritual renewal in the crowded pantheon of the Hindus and Buddhists of Nepal. But the spirit of violence is not far behind her. A Novella, originally published as The High Road to the Mountain Gods
author: Jacques  Antoine
